column1: This data contains information that has been converted from current native currency units (NCU) to constant US Dollars. The NCU values are contained in the 'value-ncu' column, while the converted and deflated values are contained in the 'value' column.
The following tabs have been included for reference purposes:
The following is data downloaded from Development Initiative's Datahub: http://devinit.org/data
It is provided on an as-is basis under an open-use license.
